abstract.t: This document proposes a standard format and a standard navigationmechanism so that mail stores can provide interoperable access tomailboxes and messages over HTTP. Mailbox contents and listings ofmailboxes are exposed as Atom Feeds, while messages themselves aredownloaded as a document of type message/822. Each mailbox and eachmessage is assigned an HTTP URL, and if permissions checks aresatisfied, each message may be downloaded independently.
